text: At Indian Cultural Centre auditorium on 17 March at 3.00 pmIndian Cultural Centre will screen one of the most popular mystery thriller bollywood film Kahaani ,featuring Vidya Balan. Nawazuddin Siddiqui and Parambrata Chatterjee in lead roles, screenplay and direction by Sujoy Ghosh and music by Vishal- Shekhar at 3.00 pm on Friday 17 March 2017 at its auditorium at 16/2 Gregorys Road, Colombo 7.The film is noted for its deft portrayal of the city of joy. The story of Kahaani revolves around a poison gas attack in a Kolkata Metro Rail compartment. Kahaani explores themes of feminism and motherhood in male-dominated Indian society. The film won several awards, including three National Film Awards and five Filmfare Awards.
